users.urls module

users.urls.urlpatterns = [<URLPattern 'home/' [name='home']>, <URLPattern 'register/' [name='register']>]

URL configuration for the login app.

Defines URL patterns for the login app, including the home page and registration page.

users.urls.app_name

The namespace for the login app URLs.

Type:

str

URL Patterns:

  • /home/: URL pattern for the home page.

  • /register/: URL pattern for the registration page.

Each URL pattern is has been assigned to its corresponding view function.

users.views module

users.views.home(request)[source]

Render the home page.

Parameters:

request (HttpRequest) – The request object.

Returns:

Renders home page called home.html.

Return type:

HttpResponse

users.views.register(request)[source]

This function handles user registration.

If the request method is POST, the program attempts to process the registration form. If the form is valid, the program saves the user and redirects them to the login page. If the form is not valid, the program renders the registration form. If the request method is not POST, the program renders the registration form.

Parameters:

request (HttpRequest) – The request object.

Returns:

The registration page or the user is redirected to the login page.

Return type:

HttpResponse
